page.title: 14DERBY DAY IN LANGLEY VALE
page.content: On Derby Day in the morning the {horses}are out exercising and the {traffic}is building up. The car parks are on the downs, but one is in a field at the back of the village.The{Derby}the most famous race in the world, so people from all over the world come to see it.When people come to watch there is a lot of excitement and when the race starts there are cheers from the crowd. In the afternoon the{gypsies}are out and the{fair}is in full swing. The school closes early and most people go to the Derby. After the race nearly everyone goes to the fair. There are lots of{helicopters}which are fun to watch. The helicopters bring people to avoid the traffic.
